attributes.action: instruct the BBC to withdraw funding for, and participation in, the Eurovision Song Contest until such time as a revised voting procedure is introduced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The increase in block voting which has now sullied the annual showcase of 'European' musical talent raises questions about the validity of licence payers funding a politically motivated competition.
 
The 2008 competition has demonstrated very clearly that the United Kingdom would be ill advised to continue funding this venture which seems destined to ridicule our entry and undermine our participation for as long as the existing voting procedure exists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
